text: In 2006 IF Elfsborg, the Swedish football club located in Borås, won their first national title since 1961, thanks to a dramatic finish to the season, where Elfsborg hit top form at the end of the year, sealing the title thanks to Joakim Sjöhage's goal against Djurgården. When Djurgården's claim for a penalty was waved off in stoppage time, Elfsborg overhauled AIK by a single point. ==Squad== ===Goalkeepers=== * Johan Wiland * Abbas Hassan * Nicholas Sharro ===Defenders=== * Johan Sjöberg * Martin Andersson * Daniel Mobaeck * Jon Jönsson * Jesper Arvidsson * Markus Falk Olander * Andreas Augustsson ===Midfielders=== * Johan Karlsson * Jari Ilola * Anders Svensson * Samuel Holmén * Magnus Samuelsson * Sebastian Göransson * Emir Bajrami * Léandre Griffit * Stefan Ishizaki * Elmin Kurbeqović * Daniel Eres ===Attackers=== * Mathias Svensson * Joakim
